Title: Merit Badge
Plot: The pilot introduces us to Detective Charlie Crews and the painful cobwebs of his past as he returns to a world that's moved on without him. His appreciation for the details offers him up an unique insights into crime solving. Also his newfound Life reminds us of all the little things we easily take for granted.
GuestStars: Anne Moore, Brynn Thayer, Bob Rusch, Brady Smith, Antonio D. Charity, DeLon Howell, Linara Washington, Olivia Hardt
